Text.Page:
Why did they send me here? I'm not a soldier! Guard the watchpost, they said. Kill {@LinkCreature:40#4#armored piglings} and {@LinkCreature:40#3#enraged armored piglings}, they said. I'll be the one getting killed.

Unless I could pay you to kill them for me, of course.

My friend {@LinkCreature:240#1026$$Grada} owes me a gambling debt. Kill the pigs and it's yours.
Wooron sent you? Old scoundrel cheats at dice, you know.
I'm not forking over Wooron's cash unless you kill those {@LinkCreature:40#4#armored piglings} and {@LinkCreature:40#3#enraged armored piglings}.
